com.brightcove.player.event

Class EventLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brightcove.player.event.EventLogger

  • public class EventLogger
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple class that can be used to listen to and log out information on all emitted events. By default the BUFFERED_UPDATE and PROGRESS events are excluded because they are extremely chatty. They can be displayed by calling removeExclude(type).
